title: How to make a karaoke with background vocals - Quora

response.answer_text: Get the LAME encoder. First, a little preparation. ...Install Audacity and split a song. Once that's done, download and install Audacity, then import your chosen track by dragging it into the main window. ...Strip vocals and export. Double-click the bottom track to select it, then click Effects > Invert. ...Find lyrics
just sing the background vocal and let the music take the lead
